name: Ultimate Racing 2D 2
description:
The ultimate top-down racing game is back! Ultimate Racing 2D 2 includes new cars, new tracks, car editor, time-trial mode, damage, multi-class racing and more.

New features:
  • Car editor
  • Time-trial with leaderboards and ghost lap
  • Multi-class racing
  • Custom car colors
  • Lap records
  • Damage
  • Penalties
  • Medium and intermediate tyres
  • New tracks
  • New cars
  • And more
